body:
Now don't get me wrong, I am grateful that teams actually have somewhere to play against others, but IMO, reserving scrimmage servers doesn't seem correct to my eyes.
With my experience, teams aren't even able to organize a scrimmage outside of the server, and I bet they wont be able to here.
I feel like teams should get their own server, at least during tournaments, but that's just me.
Discuss or whatever.
mfw "dont copy ocn!!!".

title: Reserving Scrimmage Servers?

replies.body:
No cause your server sucks.
☐ Not REKT ☑ REKT
replies.body_tagged:
No cause your server sucks.
☐ Not REKT ☑ REKT

replies.body: Why did we reserve them to begin with?
replies.body_tagged: Why did we reserve them to begin with?

replies.body:
Went with this method for a number of reasons:
  • Fair and balanced method to get access to a private server. If you're in a tournament or not, you can still rent them out.
  • It's centralized. I have a feeling teams will be able to organize because all the info they need is on one page and every player is notified through alerts.
  • Maximum efficiency. Teams will only utilize the server for the time that they need. We will be using less server resources by having them occupied by teams when they are needed.

Went with this method for a number of reasons:

  • It's centralized. I have a feeling teams will be able to organize because all the info they need is on one page and every player is notified through alerts.
  • Maximum efficiency. Teams will only utilize the server for the time that they need. We will be using less server resources by having them occupied by teams when they are needed.

replies.body:
First reason seems reasonable.

Second, "With my experience, teams aren't even able to organize a scrimmage outside of the server, and I bet they wont be able to here.", not that the server is the problem, its that the players on most teams aren't able to show up with the limited reservations and timezones, it can be a little hectic organizing one.

Third, only have them accessible to teams playing in tournaments, like said "teams should get their own server, at least during tournaments, but that's just me."

replies.body:
If a team can't organize something as simple as a scrimmage in the frame of 2 hours, then they are going to have some troubles getting to a tournament match...

We'll be sticking with this method and only making it more open and available in the future. Slot durations will likely increase.
